scripts.preinstall: npm ls -g eslint || npm install -g eslint; npm ls -g sass-lint || npm install -g sass-lint
scripts.validate_filename: node node_modules/validate_filename/index.js -e '^[a-z0-9\-_./]+$' -m '约定文件名由小写字母、数字、_组成' `git diff --staged --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU`
scripts.eslint: files=`git diff --staged --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU | grep -iE '\.js$'`; if [ "${files:=empty}" != "empty" ]; then eslint -c .eslintrc.json $files; fi
scripts.sasslint: files=`git diff --staged --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU | grep -iE '\.s[ac]ss$'`; if [ "${files:=empty}" != "empty" ]; then sass-lint --verbose --no-exit $files; fi
scripts.publish: rm -rf build && mkdir build && uglifyjs js/cascadingdate.js -o build/cascadingdate.min.js

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run validate_filename && npm run sasslint && npm run eslint
